trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design visual para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: The WebZoneDesigner class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.
trans-unit.target: A classe WebZoneDesigner é a classe base abstrata para ambos <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, que todos os outros designers de zona herdam.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>

trans-unit.source: By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
trans-unit.target: Herdar diretamente de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>em vez de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, ele permite implementações do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método não limpa automaticamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção, permitindo que o designer processar exceções de controles filho.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Like other designers in this namespace, WebZoneDesigner overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Como outros designers nesse namespace WebZoneDesigner substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade a retornar sempre `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do designer associado ao associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> controle associado com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real associada com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.
